description:
This implements argmin and argmax, and also refactors the max location and min
location quantities to allow for field sampling.

This closes #1147.

One issue up for bikeshedding is the arguments to argmin and argmax.  Should
axis be the field to minimize, and the first argument be the field to sample?
If so, axis can't be optional anymore.  If not, then this is ready to go in.
title: Implement argmin and argmax

content.raw: I guess we can't change the return value?  It would be good to get a bit more text here explaining why this is the case.
content.html: I guess we can't change the return value? It would be good to get a bit more text here explaining why this is the case.

content.raw: Whoa--this is great work, @MatthewTurk .  I didn't expect such a full and thorough solution to the issue, but the code is definitely better because of it.  Thank you!

content.raw: Just as a quick note, getting clarity on what the right API is would be really helpful -- I don't want to change the arguments to `argmin` and `argmax` once they go in, so making sure they're correct right now would be helpful.
